spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes three Staff attacks, three Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or a combination thereof.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Telekinetic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) force damage.

bonus.name: Astral Step {@recharge 4}
entries: The githyanki teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
